column4: How do I set up an extended partition in the manual partition setup during the Ubuntu Install?
eh?  Make a partition, and flag it as extended
thats because ubuntuguide isn't the official documentation, the official wiki is much better

I used both the Gstreamer and Xine versions of Totem, VLC, some other random one that I just decided to install to test some more
did you install libdvdcss?
Well, after youre done, check.  If you dont know, then most likely you haven't, which is why nothign works, you dont have the codec
system startup? or user login?
It shouldn't, no.
of course, the mirrors are free to do whatever, they may even be being throttled

sudo -i, etc, etc.

are you on Btrfs by any chance?
no

yes
